duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide one-to-one scientific research guidance for high school students, undergraduates, and graduates, focusing on academic professional ability, critical and creative thinking.
Design appropriate courses and syllabus tailored to student backgrounds.
Develop and deliver lesson plans using a variety of teaching techniques and strategies.
Diagnose and analyze student performance, providing strategic advice on academic research ability development.
Grading and providing feedback on coursework.
Provide a recommendation letter after the course completion.

education_certification.credential: Professor or lecturer at Top 30 US universities or US Universities with Top Professional Ranking
